editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 CreateVirtualDirectory
editor.description: This procedure creates a new virtual directory in the specified web site.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server.

formElement.label: Absolute path of the script utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step (i.e: iisvdir or c:/windows/system32/iisvdir.vbs).

formElement.label: Absolute path attached to the virtual directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute physical path assigned to the virtual directory you want to create (i.e: c:/Inetpub/wwwroot/myvirtualdir).

formElement.label: Name of the virtual directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name for the virtual directory.

formElement.label: Path of the virtual directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide a path, if necessary, to the virtual directory within the web site.

formElement.label: Website name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the descriptive name, or the metabase path, of the web site for the virtual directory you want to create (i.e: Default Web Site).
